define: Use this api to handle buyer's cancellation application.

error_list.name: order.cancel_order_invalid_status
error_list.description: Invalid order_status.The order status should be IN_CANCEL.

error_list.description: Invalid order_status.The order status should be IN_CANCEL.

error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
